# Verification and validation

To support a variety of use cases, Vault verifies protocol implementation and
integrations with partner products, appliances, and applications that support
advanced data protection features.

- [Verified communication protocols](/vault/docs/partners/protocols)
- [Verified partners for auto unsealing and HSM](/vault/docs/partners/hsm)
- [Verified partners for external keys](/vault/docs/partners/external-keys)
